subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: End users are provided with technical assisstance, training, incentives and support to identify the areas the technlogies can be improved, install new equipment, capture and recycle refregirent gases etc. Sectors covered include industrial and transport (vehicle retrofitting).
subproject.title: NCAP FOR PHASE OUT OF OZONE DE
